textAfterTable: Index: S&P/ASX 300 Sector: Consumer Discretionary SGN DETAILS STW Communications Group Limited (SGN) is an Australian marketing and communications group, comprising over 75 companies. SGN provides advertising and communications services for clients through channels including television, radio, print, outdoor and electronic forms. SGN’s services are offered in Australia and New Zealand, South East Asia, UK, USA and Hong Kong. SGN operates two divisions namely, advertising, production & media and diversified communications. www.stwgroup.com.au SGN OWNERS Cavendish Square Holdings BV HSBC Custody Nominees (Australia) Limited National Nominees Limited JP Morgan Nominees Australia Limited Citicorp Nominees Pty Limited Other SGN MANAGEMENT Name Title Lukas Aviani Chief Financial Officer
